message: Let's split it 60/40, it's a fair start!
You got lucky last round, but I'm taking a bigger slice this time!
You took a big bite, now it's my turn to take a smaller bite!
You took a smaller bite, now I'll take an even bigger one!
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a slightly bigger slice this time!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting closer to the whole pie, but I'll give you a slightly smaller slice this time!
You're running out of time, and I'm not going to let you have it all!
You're getting close to the whole pie, but I'll give you a slightly bigger slice this time... maybe it'll be enough to make you accept?
You're running out of time, and I'm not budging!
You're getting really close to the whole pie, but I'll give you a slightly bigger slice this time... maybe it'll be enough to make you accept?
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it!
